text: Armando Merodio Pesquera (23 August 1935 â€“ 21 June 2018) was a Spanish retired footballer. He was born in Barcelona. He played as a striker. He was known for playing with Athletic Bilbao from 1958 to 1963. Merodio died on 21 June 2018 from congestive heart failure in Barcelona, aged 82.Fallece Armando Merodio, delantero del Athletic en los 50 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Barcelona
